elements.name: question1
elements.title: You visit an art exhibition with your friend Luca. Luca stops in front of a painting and says: "That's not art!" You disagree. Write a reply to Luca below.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: The painter Paul Klee defined art with the following words: "Art does not reproduce the visible, but makes visible." Explain in your own words what Paul Klee probably means by this.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Photography is also part of art. Take a photo with your smartphone that has an artistic character. Explain to a colleague why this photo has an artistic character for you and how it differs from the many other photos on your phone.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Find three songs that belong to a musical genre of your choice. Listen to the songs carefully and note down any similarities that all three songs have.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is your favorite film or series? Make a note of why it is (not) art. Explain your thoughts to your colleagues.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Search the Internet for a well-known architectural building in your municipality. Find out about the origins of the building and find out what is special about it. Then describe the results of your research here.
